def.name: No malaria primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No malaria primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Malaria vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO)

a:s.a:s: "Number of Malaria Primary Series Doses Administered"

def.name: Client's age is less than 5 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 5 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 5 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO)

def.name: Client's age is more than or equal to 5 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 5 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" ≥ 5 months

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO)

def.name: The latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Malaria vaccines") < 4 weeks

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 4-dose schedule (The RTS,S/AS01 malaria vaccine should be used for the prevention of Plasmodium falciparum malaria in children living in regions with moderate to high malaria transmission, as defined by WHO)
